text: "You Make Loving Fun" is a 1977 song by British American band Fleetwood Mac and taken from their 11th studio album Rumours. It made number 7 in Canada, number 9 in the United States, number 22 in the Netherlands, number 26 in New Zealand and number 45 in the United Kingdom. It was covered by Cyndi Lauper in 1984. Category:1977 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Cyndi Lauper songs Category:Fleetwood Mac songs
title: You Make Loving Fun
